metadata.title: CVE-2024-50165 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Preserve param->string when parsing mount optionsIn bpf_parse_param(), keep the value of param->string intact so it canbe freed later. Otherwise, the kmalloc area pointed to by param->stringwill be leaked as shown below:unreferenced object 0xffff888118c46d20 (size 8):  comm "new_name", pid 12109, jiffies 4295580214  hex dump (first 8 bytes):    61 6e 79 00 38 c9 5c 7e                          any.8.\~  backtrace (crc e1b7f876):    [<00000000c6848ac7>] kmemleak_alloc+0x4b/0x80    [<00000000de9f7d00>] __kmalloc_node_track_caller_noprof+0x36e/0x4a0    [<000000003e29b886>] memdup_user+0x32/0xa0    [<0000000007248326>] strndup_user+0x46/0x60    [<0000000035b3dd29>] __x64_sys_fsconfig+0x368/0x3d0    [<0000000018657927>] x64_sys_call+0xff/0x9f0    [<00000000c0cabc95>] do_syscall_64+0x3b/0xc0    [<000000002f331597>] entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x4b/0x53

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
